solution_line_template: The black and pink notebook cost a total of ${black_notebook_cost} + ${pink_notebook_cost} = $<<{black_notebook_cost}+{pink_notebook_cost}={black_and_pink_cost}>>{black_and_pink_cost}
The green notebooks cost a total of ${total_cost} - ${black_and_pink_cost} = $<<{total_cost}-{black_and_pink_cost}={total_green_notebooks_cost}>>{total_green_notebooks_cost}
